search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for mloflo (mloflo.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official URL for the pricing page of Mloflo is: [https://mloflo.com/pricing](https://mloflo.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

“All plans require an activation which needs to be completed by the system administrator  
\*\*Minutes are the combines total of inbound and outbound voice calls. Voice minutes replenish on the first day of your new billing cycle each month. Annual plans renew each month on the  
company’s anniversary day of initial sign-up. Minutes are charged for all connected calls and will be rounded up to the nearest minute.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Additional fees apply for certain features and activation fees are required for SMS/MMS plans.
